Trade/Device Name(s): Nova StatSensor Creatinine Hospital Meter System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Nova StatSensor Creatinine Hospital Meter System for measurement of creatinine in whole blood using enzymatic electrochemical biosensor technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use by healthcare professionals and for Point-Of-Care usage for quantitative measurement of creatinine in capillary, venous, and arterial whole blood; used in diagnosis and treatment of renal diseases and monitoring renal dialysis; not for use in neonates.
